languages.text: "В общем, и поделом ей. М-мы с ребятками как узнали, что Ризза доигралась — сразу в-всех ее дружков в шлюз выпустили погулять. Н-нам такого не надо, мы сами-то заимператорцы! Я, вот, наоборот, только сильнее уверовал, как узнал, что Егойным правосудием еретичку старую прихлобучило!" {n}Он неумело, но с чувством складывает косой символ аквилы мозолистыми ладонями.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "В общем, и поделом ей. М-мы с ребятками как узнали, что Ризза доигралась — сразу в-всех ее пособников хаосолюбов и ксенофилов порубили да в шлюз выкинули. Н-нам такого не надо, мы сами-то за Императора! Я, вот, наоборот, только сильнее уверовал, как узнал что сам Владыка руку Ее Светлости Чорда направил!" {n}Он неумело, но с чувством складывает косой символ аквилы мозолистыми ладонями.{/n}
traits.speaker: NewPirateVendor

languages.text: "Anyway, she had it coming. As soon as me and the boys heard Ryzza's number was up, we sent all her pals for a walk under the stars and slammed the airlock behind them. We'll have none of that, thank you very much! We're the priests of pro-Emperor! Me, I became that much stronger in my faith when I found out His righteous justice had bashed the old heretic!" {n}He puts his calloused palms together in an awkwardly lopsided but heartfelt sign of the Aquila.{/n}
languages.original_text: "В общем, и поделом ей. М-мы с ребятками как узнали, что Ризза доигралась — сразу в-всех ее дружков в шлюз выпустили погулять. Н-нам такого не надо, мы сами-то заимператорцы! Я, вот, наоборот, только сильнее уверовал, как узнал, что Егойным правосудием еретичку старую прихлобучило!" {n}Он неумело, но с чувством складывает косой символ аквилы мозолистыми ладонями.{/n}

We'll have none of that, thank you very much! We're the proest of pro-Emperor! Me, I became that much stronger in my faith when I found out His righteous justice had bashed the old heretic!" {n}He puts his calloused palms together in an awkwardly lopsided but heartfelt sign of the Aquila.{/n}

traits.speaker: NewPirateVendor

languages.text: “总之，不管怎么说，这都是她自找的。我和剩下那些小伙子们一发现莱萨翘辫子了，就立刻送她所有的伙伴都去虚空里散步了，之后关上了气闸。我们这里可没有异端分子，我向您保证！我们都是帝皇老大的牧师！至于我，当我发现帝皇正义的审判消灭了那个老异端分子的时候，我的信仰变得更加坚定了！”{n}他合拢着长满老茧的双手，笨拙地做了个歪斜的双头鹰手势，但态度却发自心底。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Anyway, she had it coming. As soon as me and the boys heard Ryzza's number was up, we sent all her pals for a walk under the stars and slammed the airlock behind them. We'll have none of that, thank you very much! We're the priests of pro-Emperor! Me, I became that much stronger in my faith when I found out His righteous justice had bashed the old heretic!" {n}He puts his calloused palms together in an awkwardly lopsided but heartfelt sign of the Aquila.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “总之，不管怎么说，这都是她自找的。我和剩下那些小伙子们一发现莱萨翘辫子了，就立刻送她所有的伙伴都去星空下散步了，然后关上了气闸。我们这里可没有异端分子，我向您保证！我们都是帝皇老大的牧师！至于我，当我发现帝皇正义的审判消灭了那个老异端分子的时候，我的信仰变得更加坚定了！”{n}他合拢着长满老茧的双手，笨拙地做了个歪斜的双头鹰手势，但态度却发自心底。{/n}
traits.speaker: NewPirateVendor

languages.text: 「とにかく、彼女は知っていたんです。私やダチらは、リザの番号が上がったと聞くや否や、彼女の仲間達を星空の下の散歩に送り出してエアロックの扉を閉めました。面倒事はごめんでしたから！私たちは、親皇帝の神父なんです！皇帝の正義があの異端者をバッサリと切り捨てたと知った時点で、信仰心はより一層強くなりましたよ！」{n}彼はタコのできた手を合わせで、不器用そうにアクィラの印を作った。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Anyway, she had it coming. As soon as me and the boys heard Ryzza's number was up, we sent all her pals for a walk under the stars and slammed the airlock behind them. We'll have none of that, thank you very much! We're the priests of pro-Emperor! Me, I became that much stronger in my faith when I found out His righteous justice had bashed the old heretic!" {n}He puts his calloused palms together in an awkwardly lopsided but heartfelt sign of the Aquila.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「とにかく、彼女は知っていたんです。私やダチらは、リザの番号が上がったと聞くや否や、彼女の仲間達を星空の下の散歩に送り出してエアロックの扉を閉めました。面倒事はごめんでしたから！私たちは、親皇帝の神父なんです！皇帝の正義があの異端者をバッサリと切り捨てたと知った時点で、信仰心はより一層強くなりましたよ！」{n}彼はタコのできた手を合わせで、不器用そうにアクィラの印を作った。{/n}
traits.speaker: NewPirateVendor

languages.text: «Total, se lo merecía. En cuanto los chicos y yo nos enteramos de que a Ryzza le había llegado su hora, mandamos a todos sus amigos a dar un paseo bajo las estrellas y cerramos la esclusa. ¡No nos va nada de eso, gracias! ¡Somos los sacerdotes pro-Emperador! ¡Mi fe se hizo más fuerte cuando supe que Su justicia había acabado con la vieja hereje!». {n}Junta sus callosas palmas en un torpe pero sentido signo del Aquila.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Anyway, she had it coming. As soon as me and the boys heard Ryzza's number was up, we sent all her pals for a walk under the stars and slammed the airlock behind them. We'll have none of that, thank you very much! We're the priests of pro-Emperor! Me, I became that much stronger in my faith when I found out His righteous justice had bashed the old heretic!" {n}He puts his calloused palms together in an awkwardly lopsided but heartfelt sign of the Aquila.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Total, se lo merecía. En cuanto los chicos y yo nos enteramos de que a Ryzza le había llegado su hora, mandamos a todos sus amigos a dar un paseo bajo las estrellas y cerramos la esclusa. ¡No nos va nada de eso, gracias! ¡Somos los sacerdotes pro-Emperador! ¡Mi fe se hizo más fuerte cuando supe que Su justicia había acabado con la vieja hereje!». {n}Junta sus callosas palmas en un torpe pero sentido signo del Aquila.{/n}
traits.speaker: NewPirateVendor

languages.text: "Jedenfalls hatte sie es verdient. Sobald die Jungs und ich gehört haben, dass Ryzza Geschichte ist, haben wir ihre ganzen Freude zu einem Spaziergang in den Sternen geschickt und die Luftschleuse hinter ihnen zugeknallt. Wir können gut ohne die leben, danke auch! Wir sind die Priester von Pro-Imperator! Mein Glaube ist viel stärker geworden, als ich gehört habe, dass die rechtschaffene Gerechtigkeit des Imperators die alte Ketzerin plattgemacht hat!" {n}Er legt seine schwieligen Hände zu einem unbeholfen schiefen, aber von Herzen kommenden Zeichen des Adlers zusammen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Anyway, she had it coming. As soon as me and the boys heard Ryzza's number was up, we sent all her pals for a walk under the stars and slammed the airlock behind them. We'll have none of that, thank you very much! We're the priests of pro-Emperor! Me, I became that much stronger in my faith when I found out His righteous justice had bashed the old heretic!" {n}He puts his calloused palms together in an awkwardly lopsided but heartfelt sign of the Aquila.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Jedenfalls hatte sie es verdient. Sobald die Jungs und ich gehört haben, dass Ryzza Geschichte ist, haben wir ihre ganzen Freude zu einem Spaziergang in den Sternen geschickt und die Luftschleuse hinter ihnen zugeknallt. Wir können gut ohne die leben, danke auch! Wir sind die Priester von Pro-Imperator! Mein Glaube ist viel stärker geworden, als ich gehört habe, dass die rechtschaffene Gerechtigkeit des Imperators die alte Ketzerin plattgemacht hat!" {n}Er legt seine schwieligen Hände zu einem unbeholfen schiefen, aber von Herzen kommenden Zeichen des Adlers zusammen.{/n}
traits.speaker: NewPirateVendor

languages.text: « Bref, ça lui pendait au nez. Dès qu'on a su pour Ryzza, les gars et moi, on a envoyé tous ses copains faire un petit tour dans l'espace et on a verrouillé le sas derrière eux. On voulait pas d'autres siphonnés du bocal à bord, ça, non ! Nous, on est des prêtres pro-Empereur ! En tout cas, moi, quand j'ai appris que cette vieille garce hérétique avait subi Sa justice divine, je me suis senti plus croyant que jamais ! » {n}Il joint ses paumes calleuses dans une tentative à la fois maladroite et sincère de former le signe de l'Aquila.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Anyway, she had it coming. As soon as me and the boys heard Ryzza's number was up, we sent all her pals for a walk under the stars and slammed the airlock behind them. We'll have none of that, thank you very much! We're the priests of pro-Emperor! Me, I became that much stronger in my faith when I found out His righteous justice had bashed the old heretic!" {n}He puts his calloused palms together in an awkwardly lopsided but heartfelt sign of the Aquila.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Bref, ça lui pendait au nez. Dès qu'on a su pour Ryzza, les gars et moi, on a envoyé tous ses copains faire un petit tour dans l'espace et on a verrouillé le sas derrière eux. On voulait pas d'autres siphonnés du bocal à bord, ça, non ! Nous, on est des prêtres pro-Empereur ! En tout cas, moi, quand j'ai appris que cette vieille garce hérétique avait subi Sa justice divine, je me suis senti plus croyant que jamais ! » {n}Il joint ses paumes calleuses dans une tentative à la fois maladroite et sincère de former le signe de l'Aquila.{/n}
traits.speaker: NewPirateVendor

languages.text: "Neyse, başına geleni hak etmişti zaten. Ryzza'nın suyunun kaynadığını duyunca toplanıp aramızda ona yakın olanları postaladık, kapıyı da üstlerine kapattık. Aman, biz almayalım! İmparatoner'in yolundayız biz! Şahsen kâfir ihtiyarın O'nun ilahi adaletiyle yüzleştiğini duyunca imanım güçlendi!" {n}Nasırlı avuçlarını birleştirip tuhaf derecede aksak ama hayli içten bir Çift Başlı Kartal işareti yapıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Anyway, she had it coming. As soon as me and the boys heard Ryzza's number was up, we sent all her pals for a walk under the stars and slammed the airlock behind them. We'll have none of that, thank you very much! We're the priests of pro-Emperor! Me, I became that much stronger in my faith when I found out His righteous justice had bashed the old heretic!" {n}He puts his calloused palms together in an awkwardly lopsided but heartfelt sign of the Aquila.{/n}
